<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"properties":{"file":{"type":"string","format":"binary","title":"File","description":"The file to upload."},"purpose":{"type":"string","enum":["assistants","batch"],"title":"OpenAIFilePurpose","description":"Valid purpose values for OpenAI Files API."},"expires_after":{"anyOf":[{"title":"ExpiresAfter","properties":{"anchor":{"type":"string","const":"created_at","title":"Anchor","description":"The anchor point for expiration, must be 'created_at'."},"seconds":{"type":"integer","maximum":2592000,"minimum":3600,"title":"Seconds","description":"Seconds until expiration, between 3600 (1 hour) and 2592000 (30 days)."}},"type":"object","required":["anchor","seconds"],"description":"Control expiration of uploaded files."},{"type":"null"}],"description":"Optional expiration settings.","title":"ExpiresAfter"}},"type":"object","required":["file","purpose"],"title":"Body_upload_file_v1_files_post"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
